name: Easy Chicken Pasta
description: Dinner in a pinch! Frozen veggies are a lifesaver on busy nights—they’re affordable, last forever in the freezer, and are just as nutritious as fresh veggies. Family friendly Rosée Sauce spruces up a simple pasta night and leftover Rotisserie Chicken is a quick and yummy protein to bulk up your dish. Swap in any canned or cooked lean protein you have on hand.
preparation: Cook pasta in a large pot in boiling water according to package directions. Drain and return to pot.
Place pot back on stovetop over low heat. Add sauce and chicken; stir until warmed through. Stir in frozen peas.
tips: Got some more frozen veggies on hand? Add 3 cups to the pot with boiling water and pasta for the final 3–4 mins cooking time.

products.name: Rosée Sauce Mix (Pack of 3)
summary: Tired of the same old pasta? It’s time to take it to the next level with something a little fancy but oh-so-easy to make: Rosée Sauce. Creamy with a rich tomato flavour, this thick sauce is very family-friendly and easily clings to your favourite noodles. Make it with two simple ingredients, milk and tomato paste, in just five minutes in the microwave!

products.name: Rotisserie Chicken Seasoning (Pack of 3)
summary: The days of dry oven-roasted chicken that takes forever to make are over! There’s a better way, and it’s quick, juicy, and oh-so-tasty with Rotisserie Chicken Seasoning. In 20 minutes, you can cook a whole chicken in the microwave using the Round Steamer. With a flavour that outshines the store-bought kin —free of unnecessary additives and too much sodium—Rotisserie Chicken is so fast and easy it’s perfect for any night of the week!
